Kayako - ticket id 60232940 // Muhammad Rizwan commented publicly: Dear Shingo,

Thank you for your follow-up and for sharing your thoughts with us.

We understand that this request has been important to you, and we appreciate the time you’ve taken to follow up on ITPEF-413. After reconfirming internally with our product team, we would like to clarify that this functionality was reviewed but was never planned for implementation.

As such, there is no further development update or alternative solution available beyond the workaround we previously shared. At this time, the workaround represents the final resolution for ITPEF-413.

Regarding ticket #4389067, it has not been removed and remains available for your reference. You can continue to view its full history and details directly through the support portal.

We understand this may not be the outcome you were hoping for, and we truly appreciate your understanding. If you have any other questions or need assistance with the workaround, please don’t hesitate to let us know.

Best regards,
Muhammad Rizwan
Gensym Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.

Kayako - ticket id 60232940 // Muhammad Rizwan commented privately:  	* Well, we can not do anything more here
 	* This was never planned to be implemented.
 	* The customer will have to work with the workaround.
 	* This workaround is the resolution of  ITPEF-413 for now.

Kayako - ticket id 60232940 // Csaba Daniel commented publicly: Dear Shingo,

Thank you for your continued patience.

Our product team has confirmed that the option to reorder user menu choices beyond alphabetical sorting was never officially planned. However, they’ve suggested a workaround: adding a short prefix at the start of each name to force the desired sort order. They’ve also provided a screenshot for reference:

image

Please let us know if you have any other questions.

Best regards,
Csaba Daniel
Gensym Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.

• Re: [SC-4917] [60232940] Gensym Feature request status GENSYMPEF-1 - A meaningful response has been received in this SC that addresses the customer's request. GPT has suggested the following reply:
_________________________________________

Dear Customer,

Thank you for your continued patience.

Our product team has confirmed that the option to reorder user menu choices beyond alphabetical sorting was never officially planned. However, they’ve suggested a workaround: adding a short prefix at the start of each name to force the desired sort order. They’ve also provided a screenshot for reference.

Please let us know if you’d like any assistance with using this workaround, or if there are any other questions we can help answer.

Kind regards,_________________________________________

I have marked the SC as closed for you to review and send the reply to the customer. If you would like me to follow up automatically after the next on-hold timer expires, please REOPEN the SC. Cheers!

Given the above, I have opened the ticket so an agent can review it manually.
